query.doLogin: SELECT usr_num, name, auth_type FROM user WHERE id = '%s' AND pw = '%s'
query.doAttend: UPDATE attend ATT SET ATT.attend_state = (SELECT dif FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN Subtime(Time(ATT2.time), (SELECT Time(c.start_time) FROM course_time c WHERE c.cou_num = ATT2.cou_num AND c.weekday = Weekday(ATT2.time) + 1 LIMIT %d, %d)) < Time('00:30:00') THEN 1000 WHEN Subtime(Time(ATT2.time), (SELECT Time(c.start_time) FROM course_time c WHERE c.cou_num = ATT2.cou_num AND c.weekday = Weekday(ATT2.time) + 1 LIMIT %d, %d)) < Time('01:00:00') THEN 100 ELSE 1 end AS dif FROM attend ATT2 WHERE ATT2.cou_num = 4 AND ATT2.stu_num = 37 AND ATT2.order = 2 AND ATT2.time = '2017-03-06 16:30:00') AS p) WHERE ATT.cou_num = %s AND ATT.stu_num IN (%s) AND ATT.order = %s AND ATT.time = '%s'
query.getStuInfo: SELECT USR.usr_num, USR.name, USR.auth_type, COU.cou_num, COU.cou_name, PRO.name pro_name FROM user USR, course COU, study STD, user PRO WHERE USR.usr_num = %s AND USR.usr_num = STD.stu_num AND STD.cou_num = COU.cou_num AND COU.pro_num = PRO.usr_num
query.getProInfo: SELECT PRO.usr_num, PRO.name, PRO.auth_type, COU.cou_num, COU.cou_name, PRO.name pro_name FROM user PRO, course COU WHERE PRO.usr_num = %s AND PRO.usr_num = COU.pro_num
query.getCourse: SELECT COU.cou_num, COU.cou_name, PRO.name pro_name FROM user PRO, course COU, study STD WHERE STD.stu_num = %s AND STD.cou_num = COU.cou_num AND COU.pro_num = PRO.usr_num
query.getSchedule: SELECT COU.cou_num, COUT.weekday, PRO.name, COU.cou_name, COUT.place, COUT.start_time, COUT.during_time FROM study STU, course_time COUT, course COU, user PRO WHERE STU.stu_num = %s AND COUT.cou_num = COU.cou_num and COU.pro_num = PRO.usr_num AND STU.cou_num = COUT.cou_num
query.getStuAttend: SELECT COU.cou_name, ATT.stu_num, date(ATT.time) date, sum(ATT.attend_state) att_cnt FROM attend ATT, course COU WHERE ATT.stu_num = %s AND ATT.cou_num = %s AND COU.cou_num = ATT.cou_num GROUP by ATT.cou_num, ATT.stu_num, date(ATT.time)
query.getUsersInfo: SELECT usr_num, id, name FROM user WHERE usr_num IN (%s)
query.getAttendTimeAll: SELECT ATT.cou_num, ATT.order, ATT.time, CONCAT(COU.cou_name, ' - ', DATE_FORMAT(ATT.time, '%Y년 %m월 %d일(%w) %H시 %i분')) time_string FROM attend ATT, course COU WHERE stu_num = %s AND COU.cou_num = ATT.cou_num;
